title: Watertown 3 BED 2 BATH--2 Parking Spots Inc-- 258 Belmont
posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts - Porter Square', 'Watertown 3 Bedroom with 2 Car Parking', 'Watertown / Watertown Center /', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#132663', 'Apartment Summary', '3 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment on the 1st floor of a Three-Family.', 'Hardwood floors throughout, eat-in kitchen with dishwasher and disposal, back porch.', '2 off street parking spots are included.', ' (Reference #13266', 'Features', 'Three-Family structure, Wood Frame architecture, on the 1ST floor.', '30 minute walk to the T.', '4 minute walk to Major Bus Routes.', 'Washer free in basement, Dryer free in basement, Cable Ready.', 'Off Street Parking Available.', 'Apartment Details', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Bedrooms:', '3', 'Kitchen:', 'Eat in Kitchen.', ' Separate dining room.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal, Microwave.', 'Bath:', '2', 'Location:', 'Watertown/Watertown Center', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Reference:', '#132663', 'Contact Information', 'Agent:', 'Ryan Moore', 'Call:', '860-519-3644', 'Please mention reference #', '132663', 'Email:', 'ryan.moore @ <URL>', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', '** Pictures are of model unit, and furnished appliances may vary.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
